bioconda.name: bioconductor-annotationhubdata
bioconda.summary: Transform public data resources into Bioconductor Data Structures

biotools.summary: These recipes convert a wide variety and a growing number of public bioinformatic data sets into easily-used standard BioConductor data structures.

bioschemas.name: AnnotationHubData
bioschemas.summary: These recipes convert a wide variety and a growing number of public bioinformatic data sets into easily-used standard BioConductor data structures.
